content:
Hi! My name is Shravanthi and I recently graduated from the University of Victoria in Electrical and Computer Engineering. I am an aspiring Data Scientist, particularly passionate about data storytelling and information visualization with strong research skills and excellent problem-solving abilities developed through relevant coursework, real-time projects, and co-op experience. Skilled in:
 Data Science (Data Analysis and Visualization) Statistics (Descriptive/Inferential) Machine Learning (Supervised/Un-supervised) Deep Learning (PyTorch/TensorFlow)   Download my resumé. --
summary: Hi! My name is Shravanthi and I recently graduated from the University of Victoria in Electrical and Computer Engineering. I am an aspiring Data Scientist, particularly passionate about data storytelling and information visualization with strong research skills and excellent problem-solving abilities developed through relevant coursework, real-time projects, and co-op experience.
title: Shravanthi Musti

content:
Click on the Slides button above to view the built-in slides feature.   Slides can be added in a few ways:
 Create slides using Wowchemy’s Slides feature and link using slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file Upload an existing slide deck to static/ and link using url_slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file Embed your slides (e.g. Google Slides) or presentation video on this page using shortcodes.  Further event details, including page elements such as image galleries, can be added to the body of this page.
summary: An example talk using Wowchemy's Markdown slides feature.
title: Example Talk

title: Interactive Visualization of the Global Migration Trends

summary: Classifies messages received during a disaster into their respective categories.
title: Disaster Response Classification

summary: Performs forgery detection by verifying signatures to determine whether a signature is genuine or forged.
title: Forged Signature Detection using Convolutional Neural Networks

summary: Predict the employee structure of an organization for three consecutive years using a Markov chain predictive model
title: Human Resource Planning using a Markov Chain

summary: Implemented the Histogram of Oriented Gradients (HOG) algorithm from scratch in C++ and Python
title: Implementation of a HOG Feature Descriptor in C++:

summary: Detects suspicious activities that occur in automatic banking machine centres using a smart camera
title: Suspicious Activity Detection through Automated Surveillance
